name: Retainer

skills.name: Sundering Chop
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 40% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease DEF] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5% Lvi. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Resolute Stance
skills.raw_description:
Heals this Champion by 40% of their MAX HP and places a [Counterattack] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Heal +5%
Lvl. 3 Heal +5%
Lvl. 4 Heal +5%
Lvl. 5 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Hypnotize
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases the target's Turn Meter by 50%. If the target's Turn Meter is fully depleted, places a [Sleep] debuff on them for 1 turn.
Damage based on: [DEF]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +10%
Lvl. 5 Damage +10%
Lvl. 6 Cooldown -1

structured_data.description: Member of the faction Dark Elves, Retainer is a champion of Rare rarity and of Def type
structured_data.name: Retainer

default_description: Retainer is a rare def champion from the faction Dark Elves doing void damage
lore:
The Retainer is a fiercely loyal warrior in the service of one of the ancient and noble Dark Elven houses. Sworn to service until death or dismissal, he wields a blade crafted in the forges of Fire Knight's Keep, and quenched in the blood of orcs – a blade he is honor-bound to fall upon should his Lord die in battle.

Like all in service to his master’s house, his armor and hair are dyed a bold azure – a sign of the unbreakable faith in his liege. A master swordsman, the Retainer also possesses the elven gift of hypnosis.
